page.title: 09HEALTH IN THE CLUNTON AREA
page.content: SOCIAL WORKERS. Social workers are based at Shirehall in Shrewsbury. They have a framework of rules to work within which do work but often country folk have their own! DOCTOR. There are surgeries at Clun, Craven Arms and Bishop's Castle. DENTISTS. There are practies at Church Stretton, Craven Arms, Ludlow. Domiciliary visits are also available to those who are unable to attend. DISTRICT NURSE HEALTH VISITOR HOME HELP. VISITING CHIROPODIST BATH LADY. Weekly baths for tthose unable to cope. W.R.V.S. The W.R.V.S. provide a Meals on Wheels service for the elderly twice a week.
